title: Wahl Professional 5 Star Series Shaver Shaper Replacement Super Close Gold Foil and Cutter Bar Assembly, Super Close Shaving for Professional Barbers and Stylists - Model 7031-100
features: PROFESSIONAL PRECISION: Wahl Professional's 5-Star Series Replacement Gold Foil and Cutter Bar Assembly was engineered to deliver the sharp performance that experts demand. Designed specifically for use with the Wahl 5-Star Series Shaver Shaper (#8061-100.) Keep your shaver in new condition with this all-in-one replacement package cutter bar and super close foil; intended for professional use only

FOR SUPER CLOSE SHAVING: The 5 Star Replacement Super Close Gold Foil and Cutter Bar Assembly is your all-in-one replacement package for the Wahl Professional 5 Star Series Shaver Shaper. This shaver cuts super razor close for the ultimate finishing job on a variety of cuts. Keep your Shaver Shaper like new with this replacement parts kit

REPLACEMENT SHAVER PARTS: For your convenience the Replacement Super Close Gold Foil and Cutter Bar Assembly is available to keep your Shaver Shaper like new in tip-top shape. Designed to get the closest shave possible without being painful or irritating, the replacement package includes a hypo-allergenic gold foil and a gold cutter bar assembly
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Wahl Professional 5 Star Replacement Super Close Gold Foil and Cutter Bar (#7031-100) Compatible only with the Wahl 5-Star Shaver Shaper. (#8061-100)
PLEASE NOTE: Due to continuous improvement, the product appearance may slightly vary from the product images on this listing
description: From Wahl Professional's commercial grade line of products, the 5-Star Series Replacement Foil is designed for professional use only with the Wahl 5-Star Series #8061-100, 8061, and 8547 Shavers. The 5-Star Series Replacement Foil is your all-in-one replacement package for the Wahl Professional 5-Star Series Shaver. This shaver cuts razor close for the ultimate finishing job on a variety of cuts. Designed to get the closest shave possible without being painful or irritating, the replacement package includes hypo-allergenic gold foil which prevents bumps and cutter bar assembly for a like-new shaver. Wahl Professional Products purchased from this authorized dealer feature a manufacturer's warranty, which is not available from unauthorized dealers.
